columns.name: compare
columns.description: The compare parameter for the metric in alert policy.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the alert policy.

columns.name: value
columns.description: The value of the metric threshold in alert policy.

columns.name: interval
columns.description: The interval time of the metric in alert policy.

columns.name: urn
columns.description: The uniform resource name (URN) for the alert policy.

columns.name: alerts
columns.description: The notification details where alert details will be send.

columns.name: entities
columns.description: An array of entities of the alert policy.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: An array of tags for the resource.
